Disinfect instruments.sentence: The technician gathers all used surgical instruments for disinfection.
Disinfect instruments.subject: The technician

Disinfect instruments.sentence: The technician cleans the instruments with soap and water to remove any debris.
Disinfect instruments.subject: The technician

Disinfect instruments.sentence: The technician immerses the instruments in a disinfectant solution for the recommended time.
Disinfect instruments.subject: The technician

Disinfect instruments.sentence: The technician rinses the instruments with sterile water to remove any residual disinfectant.
Disinfect instruments.subject: The technician

Disinfect instruments.sentence: The technician dries the instruments using a clean, sterile cloth before storage.
Disinfect instruments.subject: The technician
